title: Lmaooo
content: Also first batch with freshers partyüéâüéâüéâ

comments.body:
What's he yapping about?
I couldn't decipher it.
What program is this?
Orientation to PESU I/O
Who is this retard?
Prof ajoy kumar coo pesu and how tf dont you know him
Some context anyone ?
RR Kids couldn't keep quiet even when he entered so he started ranting that we are trying to put something on your resume to get you placed and you are talking to your neighbours
They aren't doing any favour for us, after all they're gobbling up money from us that too for 4 years.
Bruv i ain't a fesher lol and why would you even expect me to remember this dude.

Lol ok
I just thought which rock are you living under to not know about him while being a student of pesu

We 1st yr ppl had this orientation today about pesu app and how things like exams and libraries work

So ajoy kumar was speaking at rr campus about pesu io, and we ppl at ec campus were watching it in the mrd auditorium, which you can see in the video
Bro has insane mood swings, I saw it IRL in RR campus üò≠ üíÄ
Is he a stand up comedian
do you know why there is no iit banglore , because there is pes university. lmao

PESU I/O is not worth it for the most part... many of the topics covered you'll find online for free done much better. The only good thing out of PESU I/O is probably networking with mentors/people with similar interest(applicable for those slots which had really good mentors). You can probably also do this for free by interacting with seniors/joining clubs.
angry babu
He has a point.

This man's BS has transcended generations ig
My seniors had the same I had the same My juniors also have it the same
Avg PES Experience
Every year phenomena ü´†
Sheesh man chill out , he just asked, it's not hard to be nice

Didnt mean to sound rude lol 
But it just came out that way
the downvotes lmfao üôèüôè
Wtaf lmaooo
